extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements java.beans.PropertyChangeListener

    • Constructor Detail

      • BattleView1

        public BattleView1(BattleModelInterface modelInterface)
        constructor can take the BattleModelInterface in the future to add itself as an listener to the model. For now it only initiate the fields ROWS and COLONS, getting the values from BattleModelInterface and also it invokes the method initGUI().
        Parameters:
        modelInterface - object (reference) to BattleModel which can only reach the methods and fields declared in BattleModelInterface.
